column4: hey, how can i open an power point 2007 presentation in openoffice?
by opening it, correcting any weird artifacts, and then I think it works pretty much as you'd expect
I think when you save in PP07 you need to use something other than the default save format, come to think of it =/
Yes, that could be an issue...I'd suggest scouring google to see if anyone else knows what to do =/
